commons models package¶

SiteConfiguration class¶

Insert a function and its arguments in process pool.

Input is inserted in queues using a round-robin fashion. Every job is identified by and index that is returned by function. Not all parameters of original multiprocessing.Pool.apply_aync are implemented so far.

param func

Function to process.

type func

Callable.

param args

Arguments for the function to process.

type args

Tuple.

returns

Assigned job id.

class commons.models.site_configuration.SiteConfigurationM(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: solo.models.SingletonModel

Insert a function and its arguments in process pool.

Input is inserted in queues using a round-robin fashion. Every job is identified by and index that is returned by function. Not all parameters of original multiprocessing.Pool.apply_aync are implemented so far.

Parameters

  • func (Callable.) – Function to process.

  • args (Tuple.) – Arguments for the function to process.

Returns

Assigned job id.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

image: str¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

location: geoposition.fields.GeopositionField¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
